Apps

12 Jun 16

LightSpeedBox

LightSpeedBox is a jQuery plugin for a fancy image preview box (also called a lightbox). The plugin can walk through gallery as well as preview a single image. It's customizable and responsive.

See it in action on the gallery page of this site.

More information
14 May 16

Swypeslider

jQuery slider (carousel) plugin meant to organize a slideshow on a web-page. This plugin utilizes CSS transitions for smooth animation, support swipe, responsive and customizable.

See it in action on the main page of this site.

More information
26 Apr 16

ZeeClient

Unofficial Zeemote client for Windows OS.

This utility is meant for digital artists who've got a Windows tablet with digitizer (such as Microsoft Surface, Asus Vivotab Note etc.). And happen to have Zeemote gamepad for iOS and Android.

Use this utility to add extra assignable keys to your tablet.

Get it on GitHub
21 Oct 15

Cyberage

A classic pebble watch face with slight cyberpunk flavour. Support different time formats, weather forecast and battery level.

Made to celebrate "Back To The Future Day".

Get it on GitHub
5 Mar 15

MyIP

A teeny-tiny utility that shows IP addresses. This utility shows internal IP as well as IP that show up on the Internet (external IP). It supports IPv4 and IPv6 address formats. Also support localization (Russian and English).

This tool has been made for my colleagues that not so much into IT but has to report their IP to our remote tech support.

Get it on GitHub
This is an open-source site. Development goes on GitHub. Feel free to fork, explore, give suggestions and point out grammar and other mistakes.
